metadata.description: A curated collection of Claude AI plugins for financial analysis, product management, AI optimization, and quality assurance

plugins.name: financial-advisor
plugins.description: Financial analysis and planning for software projects

plugins.name: product-manager
plugins.description: Product strategy, competitive analysis, persona definition, and product evolution planning

plugins.name: ai-specialist
plugins.description: Proactive AI optimization agent that monitors Claude sessions, optimizes instructions, improves memory efficiency, designs test strategies, and reduces token usage

plugins.name: tax-advisor
plugins.description: EU tax analysis plugin that scans repositories for financial signals, fetches live rates from official tax authority websites, and produces tax estimates, VAT/IVA analysis, deduction reports, and compliance calendars for 8 EU countries

plugins.name: ceo
plugins.description: CEO orchestrator agent that coordinates all marketplace agents to answer complex business questions and provide executive-level strategic guidance

plugins.name: qa-engineer
plugins.description: Methodical QA specialist that maps happy paths (HP-XXX files), hunts bugs across 4 categories, and runs regression testing with structured BUG-XXX reports
